title: 8/15/17 - Protect the words that make people angry
description:
Kim Jong Un blinked. President Trump won. ...The world changes directions quickly ...The mainstream media is burning down ...An MLK speech turned into song ...Protect the words that make you angry ...Communists, Nazis & their connection leading back to the 1920s ...Update on Priority Health & Bubby Cruzan's treatment ....Americans are treading water and need their savings to do so ...Don't give your power away to a populist cause. ...

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
